thread.title: BONNIE L SHERRELL
thread.title_full: OLDIES.com reviewed by BONNIE L SHERRELL

author: BONNIE L SHERRELL
title: BONNIE L SHERRELL
text: It took several days to get the indication that the DVDs I'd ordered had been sent, and I finally got them today, over a week later. The delay in receiving them is not the fault of Oldies, of course. Am so pleased to get my four DVDs, and particularly "Stop the World, I Want to Get Off," for which I've been searching for years! Thanks so!
